rooms.name: Cell
rooms.description:
They keep you in solitary confinement.
Your cell is small. Under your bed there is a hole. Garbage is piling up in the corner.
Behind the door you see a hallway, patrolled by a single guard, Andrew. You know that guy: he's not exactly the brightest. He takes some pills and smokes on duty.
Occasionally you have cigarettes  brought to you.

items.name: Cigarettes
items.clue: You don't have the healthiest habits. Neither does the guard, Andrew.
items.description: There is a pack of cigarettes laying around.

items.name: shard
items.clue: A shard of a ceramic plate. It is sharp.
items.description: You see a sharp ceramic shard.

triggers.name: door
triggers.clue: A barred door. You can't squeeze through bars, but you can reach your hand out.

triggers.name: hole
triggers.clue: A hole leads down to a hideout you've made while the guards weren't looking.

triggers.name: Garbage
triggers.clue: There is a shard of a ceramic plate in garbage. It is sharp.

triggers.name: Guard Andrew
triggers.clue: You could use the duct tape to take Andrew's fingerprints. This will help you unlock the fingerprint reading panel in the staff room.

rooms.name: Hideout
rooms.description:
You have descended down, into your small hideout.
Here you make plans and keep some of your things. A periodic table of elements hangs on the wall.

items.name: Lighter
items.clue: In a place like this, you need a spark in your life.

items.name: Sedatives
items.clue: Take enough of these and you will sleep soundly.
items.description: You see sedatives you've snuck into the prison.

triggers.name: Periodic Table
triggers.clue: You move the table, accessing a ventilation leading upwards.

triggers.name: Cigarettes
triggers.clue: You add the sedatives, obtaining spiked cigarettes!

rooms.name: Staff
rooms.description:
You climb up the ventilation, accessing the staff room. Luckily, no one is here.
You have climbed up to the second floor. The door is locked by a fingerprint reader panel. Inside the staff room you see multiple lockers, with guards' personal possessions. In the middle of the room is a cluttered table.

items.name: Duct tape
items.clue: You have some troubles finding the edge of the tape, but you manage to do it.

triggers.name: Lockers
triggers.clue: You see Andrew's locker, Bob's locker and Kevin's locker.

triggers.name: Andrew's locker
triggers.clue: You find a pack of sclerosis pills and a LOT of reminders. Great.

items.name: fingerprint
items.clue: You could use the fingerprint to unlock the door in the Staff room
items.description: You see a piece of duct tape with a fingerprint

items.name: Charge
items.clue: One charge to your cloning device. Will allow you to use your cloning device once.
items.description: You see charges to your cloning device

items.name: Cloning Device
items.clue: Your cloning device allows you to clone people
items.description: You see your most precious cloning device. You must take it now!

items.name: Laser Gun
items.attack: You shoot the enemy with a Laser Gun!
items.miss: You try to shoot the enemy, but miss your target!
items.description: You see some weird sort of Laser Gun

items.name: Charge
items.clue: One charge to your cloning device. Will allow you to use your cloning device once.
items.description: You see charges to your cloning device
